definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיִּתְפְרוּ]] Ge 3:7 (J) they sewed together fig-leaves (acc.); Pf. 1 s. [[תָּפַ֫רְתִּי]] Job 16:15, c. acc. + [[עֲלֵי]], sackcloth I have sewed upon my skin ; Inf. cstr. [[עֵת לִתְפּוֹר]] Ec 3:6 a time to sew together (opp. [[קָרַע]]).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pt. as subst. f.pl. [[מְתַפְּרוֹת]] Ez Eze 13:18 those who keep sewing, c. acc. + [[עַל]].
